DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: This page contains brief information about tremelimumab-actl and a collection of links to more information about the use of this drug, research results, and ongoing clinical trials.
DrugInfoMetaData.FDAExternalRef: FDA label information for this drug is available at DailyMed.

Para.ExternalRef: FDA label information for this drug is available at DailyMed.

Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Tremelimumab-actl is approved to treat adults with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Hepatocellular carcinoma (a type of liver cancer) that cannot be removed by surgery. It is used with durvalumab.
Non-small cell lung cancer that has spread to other parts of the body and does not have an abnormal EGFR or ALK gene. It is used with durvalumab and platinum-based chemotherapy.

Section.Para: Tremelimumab-actl is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.

DrugInfoDisclaimer.Para: Important: The drug information on this page is meant to be educational. It is not a substitute for medical advice. The information may not cover all possible uses, actions, interactions, or side effects of this drug, or precautions to be taken while using it. Please see your health care professional for more information about your specific medical condition and the use of this drug.
